entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
